full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Compost Bin Installation at Waterton Lakes National Park

### Tender Reference Number
cb-17-12402771

### Solicitation Number
5P468-23-0191/A

### Publication Date
2023-10-12

### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-13T16:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-11-06

### Expected Contract End Date
2023-12-15

### Tender Status
Expired

#### Description
Parks Canada Agency requires a contractor to install a compost bin at Waterton Lakes National Park. The scope of work includes mobilization and demobilization, traffic management, accommodation, waste management, and disposal. The contractor must provide a complete product, including all necessary equipment, materials, and labor.

#### Important Notes
- Bids received by fax or email will be accepted as official.
- Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba; bidders must submit their bids via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document.
- Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
- The acceptable email address for responses to bid solicitations is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.
- The acceptable fax number for responses to bid solicitations is 1-855-983-1808.

#### Site Visit
A mandatory site visit is scheduled for October 19, 2023. Interested bidders must meet at the Parks Canada Main Operations Building and sign the site visit attendance sheet.

#### Security Clearance
No security clearance is required for this contract.

#### Indigenous Benefits Plan
The contractor must provide benefits to Indigenous peoples and businesses in the area.

#### Tender Evaluation
The tender will be evaluated on a combination of technical merit and price.

#### Submissions
Submissions should follow the two-submission procedure outlined in the special instructions to bidders.

#### Enquiries
Enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Government of Canada tendering service website at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Addenda will be available from this website.

#### Language
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
